“SVG”:-graphics_¶

Make sure we can embed SVG graphics. Use title that has punctuation marks.

Out:

Text(0, 1, 'svg')


import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

from local_module import N  # N = 1000

t = np.arange(N) / float(N)
win = np.hanning(N)
plt.figure()
plt.plot(t, win, color='r')
plt.text(0, 1, 'svg', size=40, va='top')

Total running time of the script: ( 0 minutes 0.070 seconds)

Download Python source code: plot_svg.py

Download Jupyter notebook: plot_svg.ipynb
